stories.text:
Anyone else having issues where copy and paste not copying an item under selection and then pasting a previous copied piece of text?

Most recent example:

- On this PDF: https://www.ocsan.gov/home/showpublisheddocument/6583/635102622226630000

- Highlight text and press Command+C then move to navigation bar and press Command+V.

Right now, it looks like it's a chromium bug as i just tested in Vivaldi and Chrome (no joy), but copy and paste seems to function in firefox.
stories.title: Ask HN: OS X 12.4 | Chromium – Command+C – Command+V – Issues

stories.text:
Input: Running a vaccine trial. Double blind.

If we give 100.000 people the vaccine.

And 100.000 a placebo.

And at the end of the trial period

8000 people who got the vaccine got sick.

4500 people who got the placebo got sick.

Is it better to get the vaccine or not ?

Output: The vaccine is better than the placebo.

https://i.imgur.com/nviZs90.png

edit:

Full url:

https://beta.openai.com/playground

Run settings:

https://i.imgur.com/sifTgPj.png
stories.title: Am I doing it wrong? (OpenAI test)
